paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

, fig. 2.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality.
Brazil , Rio de Janeiro State , 21°43’06”S , 40°11’37”W ,
73 m
deep
.

Remarks. Considered a junior synonym of
Triphoris dupliniana Olsson, 1916
by Fernandes & Pimenta (2020) .

.
